Pre-Game Insights: South Korea is set to face Japan in the 4th T20I of the ICC Mens T20 WC Sub Regional Qualifier B 2024 at the Yeonhui Cricket Ground on Sunday, 29 September 2024.
The match will be a thrilling encounter, promising an exciting match filled with intense cricketing action in the vibrant atmosphere of Incheon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be streamed live on FanCode app and website.
The match will be played at the Yeonhui Cricket Ground in Incheon.
Others: The best Dream11 team for today's match is: Captain - Sabaorish Ravichandran, Vice-Captain - An Hyobeom, Wicketkeeper - Balage Ishan Dilruksha, Batsmen - Kendel Kadowaki Fleming, Fazil Muhammad, All-Rounders - Sabaorish Ravichandran, Declan Suzuki, Kim Daeyeon, Ibrahim Takahashi, Bowlers - Lal Amir, Makoto Taniyama, Charles Hinze, An Hyobeom
